title: messaging
content: # `prefect.server.events.messaging` ## Functions ### `publish` ```python theme={null} publish(events: Iterable[ReceivedEvent]) -> None ``` Send the given events as a batch via the default publisher ### `create_event_publisher` ```python theme={null} create_event_publisher() -> EventPublisher ``` ### `create_actions_publisher` ```python theme={null} create_actions_publisher() -> Publisher ``` ## Classes ### `EventPublisher` **Methods:** #### `publish_data` ```python theme={null} publish_data(self, data: bytes, attributes: Mapping[str, str]) -> None ``` #### `publish_data` ```python theme={null} publish_data(self, data: bytes, attributes: Mapping[str, str]) -> None ``` #### `publish_event` ```python theme={null} publish_event(self, event: ReceivedEvent) -> None ``` Publishes the given events **Args:** * `event`: the event to publish
